You should mention that the liveness probe failed, and the container has been killed and recreated (hence the termination message).

Another way of showing this is using `/cluster/kubectl.sh describe pod liveness-exec`. You would be able to see the restart count increment as time goes by.

```
Name:               liveness-exec
Image(s):           gcr.io/google_containers/busybox
Host:               127.0.0.1/127.0.0.1
Labels:             test=liveness
Status:             Running
Replication Controllers:    <none>
Containers:
  liveness:
    Image:      gcr.io/google_containers/busybox
    State:      Running
      Started:      Thu, 14 May 2015 11:28:06 -0700
    Ready:      True
    Restart Count:  4
```

You would also see the killing and creating events at the bottom of the output.
